title: Victor Wanyama scores superb goal against Liverpool
description: Watch Victor Wanyama's superb strike in Tottenham's 2-2 draw with Liverpool.
content:
The midfielder had only just come off the bench when he lashed in a shot from 25 yards to draw Spurs level at Anfield.
Although the goal was overshadowed by the late drama, it will almost certainly be among the contenders for goal of the season.
Hit play on the video at the top of the page to see Wanyama's brilliant goal
